rows.label: tlk400907_msg0001
rows.name: Green barrels... This must be it!

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0002
rows.name:
And hey, aren't those the yellow
barrels from before?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0004
rows.name:
Materials for constructing artificial
Blades, without a doubt.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0005
rows.name:
The only question is, where are
they going to be taken next?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0006
rows.name: Are there any clues lying around?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0007
rows.name: There is note here written in Nopon.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0008
rows.name:
This Nopon writing, yes...
But handwriting unbelievably scruffy.
Tora not able to read.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0010
rows.name:
Neither of you can read it?
Wow. That really must be bad.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0011
rows.name:
I suppose we will simply have to
decipher it somehow...

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0012
rows.name:
That's one option, but would it not
be easier to simply keep watch on
the barrels themselves?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0013
rows.name:
You say that, but we have no idea
when the recipient will pick them up.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0014
rows.name:
Yeah, what if they don't show up
for five days or something?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0015
rows.name:
This sounds like the perfect mission
to leave to our mercenary allies.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0016
rows.name: That would be an option, too.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0017
rows.name: Which shall we go for, then?
